description: Try our easy to follow Green's Mini Halloween Lemon Cheesecakes recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Green's Mini Halloween Lemon Cheesecakes Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare Mini Lemon Cheesecakes as per back of pack instructions. Allow to chill in the fridge while making decorations.
Break 1/2 block of Milk or Dark Cooking Chocolate into pieces and place into a microwave safe bowl. Microwave until melted. Set aside to cool slightly.
Pour slightly cooled melted chocolate into a press seal bag, seal, and cut corner off one end.

For the eyes: pipe two small semi circles, small enough to fit on the top of the mini lemon cheesecake. For the mouth: pipe a curved line in the shape of a smile, and small lines vertically across the line to represent stitching. For the nose: pipe two small dots.
Place in fridge to set for at least 30 minutes.
Carefully peel off the decorations and place on top of cheesecakes.
